definition: to appreciate/to take pleasure in/to enjoy
to play/to have fun/to trifle with/toy/sth used for amusement/curio or antique (Taiwan pr. [wan4])/to keep sth for entertainment
to bestow (a reward)/to give (to an inferior)/to hand down/a reward (bestowed by a superior)/to appreciate (beauty)

sentences.english: She keeps a cat as a pet .
sentences.chinese: 她养了一只供玩赏的猫。

sentences.english: I've decided to learn photography in order that I may more instanceropridined recognize the instanceewouls of nature.
sentences.chinese: 我决断学摄影以便更能玩赏赏识自然的美。

sentences.english: They are also gentle, and may be trained to be good pets.
sentences.chinese: 它们也很温顺，可以训练为很好的玩赏动物。

sentences.english: Many people have to do the peacock garden to enjoy feeding the birds.
sentences.chinese: 许多人已将孔雀做庭院玩赏鸟饲养。

sentences.english: I noticed a small boy, delicate of bone and feature, ragged but clean, hungrily appraising a basket of freshly picked green peas.
sentences.chinese: 他如饥似渴地玩赏着一篮新采摘下来的绿豌豆。

definition: to spend one's leisure time/to idle away the time
(of an uneducated person) to mingle with the cognoscenti/to pose as a culture lover/to be a culture snob/having pretensions to culture
scholar's rock (one of the naturally-eroded, fantastically-shaped rocks put on display indoors or in gardens in China)
